title: Budgie - Never Turn Your Back On A Friend (1973/2004) [FLAC]
description:
Budgie - Never Turn Your Back On A Friend (1973) [Remastered 2004]

Track Listing:

1. Breadfan (6:05)
2. Baby Please Don't Go (5:25)
3. You Know I'll Always Love You (2:08)
4. You're The Biggest Thing Since Powdered Milk (8:46)
5. In The Grip Of A Tyrefitter's Hand (6:24)
6. Riding My Nightmare (2:40)
7. Parents (10:21)

Bonus tracks:
8. Breadfan (2003 Version) (5:27)
9. Parents (2004 Acoustic Version) (5:37)
10. Breadfan (Live 1973) (6:05)

Bonus Video: Breadfan (6:10)

Produced by Budgie

THE BAND:

Burke Shelley: bass & vocals
Tony Bourge: lead guitar, acoustic guitar & vocal
Ray Phillips: drums

Re-mastered by Robert M Corich and Mike Brown, October 2004
